-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Haskell on Rails - Files as Reactive Values
--   
@package keera-hails-reactive-fs
@version 0.0.3.4

module Hails.FS

-- | A file as a passive reactive value.
--   
--   Passive values are those that never notify of changes to them. They
--   are useful as sources of information controlled by other RVs (buttons,
--   etc.)
pasiveFileReactive :: FilePath -> ReactiveFieldReadWrite IO String

-- | A file as a reactive value. The file must exist at the time the call
--   is evaluated.
fileReactive :: FilePath -> IO (ReactiveFieldReadWrite IO String)
